WorkItem.ClosedComment: The issue was my special effect parser was missing the damage done trigger. This has been resolved in change set 35965
WorkItem.Description:
DMC:G is highly undervalued since it isn't modeling HighestStat at all.
Â 
How to reproduce? Load DPSDK model. Look at Greatness in trinket list. Delete the special effect. Greatness is value at same dps.
WorkItem.Summary: [DPSDK] HighestStat from Greatness proc has no effect on DPS

Comments.Message: Yeah, greatness proc is still causing issues, and I'm not really sure why. For now, you can either edit it to be a 300 strength proc (rather than 300 highest stat) or just give it another static 100 strength.
What issues is it having? After you get the average values back from running the special effects, just add the average HighestStat value to strength.

Or just change the DamageDone Trigger to MeleeHit.

In full:  Right-click DMC:Greatness icon -> Edit -> select the DamgeDone effect from the Special Effects dropdown ->  Edit -> set Trigger to MeleeHit -> Ok -> Ok. 

Would be nice if we didn't have to do that though :)
